pylayers.signal.bsignal.FUsignal.align¶

FUsignal.align(u2)[source]¶

align <=> intersection align : align two Usignal on a same frequency base

return a list which contains the two aligned signals
>>> i1 = EnImpulse()
>>> i2 = EnImpulse()
>>> i2.translate(-10)
>>> L  = i1.align(i2)
